channel.title: Introduction on libpasta
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on libpasta

item.title: What is libpasta?
item.description: Making Passwords Painless This library aims to be a all-in-one solution for password storage. In particular, we aim to provide: Easy-to-use password storage with sane defaults. Tools to provide parameter tuning for different use cases. Automatic migration of password to new algorithms. Cross-platform builds and cross-language bindings.
